import React, { FunctionComponent, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link, RouteComponentProps } from 'react-router-dom'; import User from '../models/user'; import voiduser from '../models/void-user'; import Cookies from 'js-cookie'; import getCurrent from '../api-request/user/get-current'; interface Props extends RouteComponentProps<{ id: string }> { usercalled: User, requestUpdate:Function } const UserSettings: FunctionComponent = ({ match, usercalled, requestUpdate }) => { const [EditPseudo, setEditPseudo] = useState(true); const [EditMail, setEditMail] = useState(true); const [EditPassWord, setEditPassWord] = useState(true); const [EditDelete, setEditDelete] = useState(true); const [user, setUser] = useState(usercalled); useEffect(() => { setUser(user) }, [match.params.id, usercalled]) var fieldToSend: Array = [] const handleInputChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent, type:string) => { fieldToSend = [type, e.target.value]; } const update = (Field:Array) => { console.log(Field[0]) console.log(Field[1]) //requestUpdate(name, value) } const deleteUser = () => { //requestDelete() } return (
